Text: Health Insurance Waiver Cc Evening MBA Students This message is to remind you that Health Insurance Waivers are due next week The forms can be downloaded from Studentsinsuranceadvisoryhtm or we can fax one to you if needed Please mailnot fax we need a signaturethem along with a copy of the front and back of your card Also please keep a copy for your own records Also please remember to fill in all of the sections of the form Please mail the completed forms to Evening MBA Office Student Services Berkeley Ca Call if you have any questions Hope Your summer is going well Josh Bortman Evening MBA Program

Student DirectoryHi all Since Im sure you are all busy reading your copy of the Fall Student Directory please let me know if you have an updates or changes that need to be made Josh Bortman Evening MBA Program

Address Update FormDear EvMBA Students Please remember to stop by the office and fill out your address update form Even if your information has not changed we would still like you to fill it out If you do not do so we will not be able to put your information in the student directory which will be available soon Once again if you do not fill out the form we will assume that you do not want to be included in the directory I hope you are having a great semester so far Thanks Josh Bortman Evening MBA Program
EHi Jeff You are on the waitlist for E Deals If you have any questions please give us a call at Josh Bortman Evening MBA Program

Bidding Cc This is a reminder to all rd year students that you should be bidding for classes today The first round of bidding ends tomorrow Thursday November at noon If you have any questions please give us a call at Good Luck Josh Bortman EWMBA Program

RE BiddingYes When you go in to bid for the second round the page will display how many seats are left in each course At PM you wrote Thats what I figured Thanks a bunch Will we know the results of the first round prior to the second round Original Message From Josh Bortman mailto Sent Thursday November PM To Dasovich Jeff Subject RE Bidding You can bid in the second round That starts tomorrow at am and goes through tuesday at noon At PM you wrote Josh Been in a meeting all morning Think I missed the bidding If I cant get in here are my bids EReal Estate Urban Land pts EGlobal Strategy pts If this wont work just let me know Sorry for any mixup Best Jeff Original Message From Josh Bortman mailto Sent Wednesday November PM To Cc Subject Bidding This is a reminder to all rd year students that you should be bidding for classes today The first round of bidding ends tomorrow Thursday November at noon If you have any questions please give us a call at Good Luck Josh Bortman EWMBA Program This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Re Units needed to graduateThat is correct you only need units to graduate Josh At PM you wrote Hi Josh Sorry to bother you But just wanted to be certain By my tally I only need to take units next semester spring to graduate Im taking units this semester Is there anyway to get that officially verified through the office Thanks much Best Jeff This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

Bidding for nd years Cc Hi Second Years Round bids have been processed and your schedules have been posted to the OLR website Almost all bids were successful and there are open seats in most classes Round begins Monday at AM and ends Tuesday at Noon As always if you have any questions give us a call Josh TJ EWMBA Program

Feedback on Biddinghtml Hi Studentsbr br buIgnore this if you are graduating this Semester or did not Bid for classesbr br br ubNow that bidding is over and you are enrolled in classes we would like to get some feedback on thenbsp bidding process and the OnLine Registrar application itselfbr br br Overall how would you rate the new registrationnbsp processbr br Which do you like better the OnLine Registrar or Telebearsbr br Any suggestions for the administrative process ie scheduling distribution of information ectbr br Any suggestions about the computer application OnLine Registrarbr br Any further insight or comments would be greatly appreciatedbr br Would you rather receive program materials via email or postal mailbr br Please be honest you wont hurt our feelings and it wont hurt your chances of getting into classes I promise This program is supposed to make things easier for you so please help us make it run as smoothly as possiblebr br Thanks br Josh Bortmanbr EWMBA Programbr br html
